Generate an example showing the use of the following idiom:
Cat got your tongue

Sure, here's an example of using the idiom "Cat got your tongue":

During a family dinner, Ravi's younger sister, Ananya, was enthusiastically recounting her recent school trip. Ravi, who usually had something to say about everything, was uncharacteristically quiet.

Ananya noticed her brother's silence and teased, "Hey, Ravi, cat got your tongue? You're awfully quiet today!"

Ravi just smiled and shrugged, still lost in his own thoughts about the upcoming exams.
